name: Infinite Children (itch)
description: Infinite Children is a science fiction audiobook video game in which life extension technology is a great inheritance. You play as members of a family questing for life extension treatments for their children while long-dead relatives as well as yet-to-be-born descendants alike send you messages through time, hoping to shape your way. In this futuristic American dream that explores the fear of being left behind, you will choose to give your child a very long life.
